name: Submarine Jack II
description:
Submarine Jack II is a sequel to the Submarine Jack app. New enemies in this game are ships dropping depth charges and torpedo towers launching torpedos at your submarine. With your submarine you navigate underwater coral reefs and minefields. Battle enemy submarines and ships with your torpedos. Tap screen to launch torpedo. Tilt device to move up/down and faster/slower.

*** NEW *** You now get 3 new submarines every 10 minutes if you run out of subs.
